Question: This person was married three times and fathered seven children, four sons and three daughters.
Hints: This person designed over 400 built structures of which about 300 survive as of 2005.
But, as with any architect, this person worked in a collaborative process and drew his ideas from the work of others.
The work contained more than 100 lithographs of this person's designs and was commonly known as the Wasmuth Portfolio.
